item.title: Introducing Salt Measurement App 1.3.3
item.description:
We are excited to announce the release of Salt Measurement App version 1.3.3!

This update includes:

  • Improved user interface

  • Support for low-sodium dietary restrictions

Stay tuned for more updates and features. Download the app now!

item.title: How to Use the Salt Measurement App
item.description:
Learn how to effectively use the Salt Measurement App for accurate salt measurement:

  1. Enter the weight of the food in grams
  2. Select your dietary restrictions (normal or low-sodium)
  3. Click on the Calculate button to get the recommended salt amount
  4. Reset the fields using the Reset button if needed

Start using the app today for healthier cooking!
